About me
I am an enthusiastic undergraduate with a keen interest in software engineering and a passion for problem-
solving. I have successfully completed several academic projects that highlight my ability to adapt and be
flexible effectively. My passion lies in exploring cutting-edge fields like cybersecurity. I am eager to leverage my
skills and dedication to contribute to impactful projects during my internship.
